website_summaries.verdict: If you can overlook that high price tag, the Beoplay P2 is a very nice little Bluetooth speaker that delivers top-notch sound for its size class.
pros: The Beoplay P2 is a stylish, travel friendly, splash-resistant Bluetooth speaker that delivers impressive sound for its small size
Battery life is decent (10 hours), and there's a built-in microphone for voice calling and voice activation
cons: lack of physical buttons for playback control may not appeal to some users

customer_reviews.title: battery is weird from first use
customer_reviews.text: I always charge my new devices before use. I charged it fully (until it turned green), then played sounds on it for about 4 hours and it started to notify me that it has low battery. I had the Bang & Olufen app open to check the battery meter, and it was at 50% then it died within couple minutes more of use. I plugged in the speaker to charge it since it has zero battery, but when I plugged it in, the app said it has 50% battery? What is going on? Do I have a faulty product?
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not 10 hrs at 3/4 volume! Maybe 3 to 4.
customer_reviews.text: It has a special charging plug, which means an additional cable I have to carry around for a supposedly portable device. So now I have a cable for my iPhone, one for my charging battery, and separate one for speaker. Sounds okay but less than I expected from B&O. My cheapie Bluetooth speaker has many more features and sounds almost as good. Even though I bought The P2 on Sale for only $100, its going back. Not Impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Parrotbb

customer_reviews.title: Sound volume buggered
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great when it works. The volume doesn’t work right and it stays at a medium low level and cannot be changed manually because there are no volume buttons on the device itself. so, it’s kind of useless because I can’t hear it unless it’s right up on me. WAY too much money for That problem. Never use it now.
customer_reviews.author: MazyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality for a Bluetooth speaker this size. This speaker lives up to the B&O reputation for crisp, clean sound. It's small footprint and decent battery life make it an easy and obvious choice for travel. It won't fill a symphony hall with sound, but it's more than a match for a hotel room or small picnic with a friend. Well worth its price. You can find a lot of cheaper speakers but you won't find a better value if sound matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cole

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat B & O sound!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker ROCKS! It’s orders of magnitude better than my Bose (sorry Bose). You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of B&O products I own many of them. This Bluetooth speaker will not disappoint you. Simple design and low on features. You control all the sound with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: Best sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Best sound for the size although pricey. No analogue jack. No level control. unusual app interface for tone controls. So very different than most. But the sound! Very clear. Very loud if you wish. The most full range sound without harshness or exaggeration. Simply put a pleasure to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Solw

customer_reviews.title: The best sound for size by far!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I needed a very portable pocket sized speaker to throw in my bag for travel. I am blown away by this little thing! Again considering this is a pocket sized speaker, the fullness and bass are unreal. Best in its class.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Teeny size - BIG SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: Teeny size - BIG SOUND! Worth every penny! Buy it, and don't think twice about the price - it sounds AMAZING for such a small package. The USB C charging is nice too see as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Beauty at a cost

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  What a product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! I own a number of speakers, headsets and other audio stuff. This ranks as the best small portable speaker I have ever heard.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate and top quality product vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound product! Accurate and brand new. Best price. Fast delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound period. Let alone for its size. Loads better than the bose soundlink mini. And more portable.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The dimension is ideal for travel and I use it for regular meeting or play music. Sound volume and quality are excellent. Only one button to power on/off speaker; very easy to use. I have my phone or laptop to control the volume without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable and good to use when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to be able to try a whole range of B&O speakers and found them all to sound quite nice. This was one of the smaller portable ones and is rechargeable. It is small enough that I enjoy taking this along on trips to use for listening to my music in hotel rooms. Certainly sounds better than my computer speakers on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Happy with speaker not with pricing

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed Buy
